QandA.label: /chat
questions: Hey!
So what have you just been up too?

children.label: Sleeping
questions: Nice!
Catching some zzzzz's

children.label: Yeah it was a good sleep
questions: Well we hope you feel rested.

children.label: Above what I would like before bed
questions: and you still had a good sleep ...
